Danbury.Danbury High School: Danbury High School is a public high school in Danbury, Connecticut, with approximately 3000 students. Despite Danbury's population of just under 81,000 (as of 2016), there is only one public high school, along with several small private schools, and one vocational high school in the city. The school is located in a suburban, residential neighborhood atop a hill that overlooks most of the city.
